attributes.additional_details: A lot of people in armthorpe go there and get bored easily and go back home. If you add more people will be outside more
attributes.background: Make the skatepark in armthorpe bigger

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
